d2mOptimizacion

Class OptimizacionMetodo2

  • java.lang.Object
    • d2mOptimizacion.Optimizacion
      • d2mOptimizacion.OptimizacionMetodo2

  • public class OptimizacionMetodo2
extends Optimizacion
    This class implements an algorithm of optimization for lists. This kind of optimization receives a list, sort the items in a new list, check if they form a closed loop, calculates the offset entities and returns the optimized list.

                                       java.util.Hashtable listaCompensada)
        Method to calculate the intersection between entities
        Parameters:
        i - is the key of the first entity.
        j - is the key of the second entity.
        ecuacion1 - is the equation of the first entity.
        elemento1 - is the first entity.
        ecuacion2 - is the equation of the second entity.
        elemento2 - is the second entity.
